channel.title: Books on Jason's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Jason's Blog

item.title: Analyzing Politics Review
item.description: Favorite and Least Favorite Content Favorite Chapters: Chapter Topic Reason 4 Condrocet’s Paradox and Arrow’s Theorem Very unintuitive results about voting and group preferences 6 Strategic Behavior Show how rules can affect legislative outcomes Least Favorite Chapters: Chapter Topic Reason 8, 9 Cooperation Models too simplistic, mostly implied that nobody would engage in collective action General Impressions Recently I’ve been reading a book called “Analyzing Politics” by Kenneth A Shepsle, which is an introduction to rational models in political science.
